mapper.update: update `project` set project_code = #{search.projectCode}, project_name = #{search.projectName}, price = #{search.price}, amount = #{search.amount}, provider_id = #{search.providerId}, provider_code = #{search.providerCode}, provider_name = #{search.providerName}, creation_date = now(), by_date = #{search.byDate}, end_date = #{search.endDate}, staff_id = #{search.staffId}, staff_code = #{search.staffCode}, department_id = #{search.departmentId} where id = #{search.id}
mapper.insert: insert into work.project (project_code, project_name, price, amount, provider_id, provider_code, provider_name, creation_date, by_date, end_date,staff_id, staff_code, department_id) values (#{search.projectCode}, #{search.projectName}, #{search.price}, #{search.amount}, #{search.providerId}, #{search.providerCode}, #{search.providerName}, now() , #{search.byDate}, #{search.endDate}, #{search.staffId}, #{search.staffCode} , #{search.departmentId})
mapper.select:
select pro.id, pro.project_code, pro.project_name, pro.price, pro.amount, pro.provider_id, pro.provider_code, pro.provider_name, pro.creation_date, pro.by_date, pro.end_date, pro.staff_id, pro.staff_code, pro.department_id from project pro left join staff stf on pro.staff_id = stf.id left join provider pvd on pro.provider_id = pvd.id where 1=1
AND pro.project_name like concat('%', #{search.projectName}, '%')
AND pro.department_id = #{search.departmentId}
GROUP BY pro.id
